overview:
Ankit Nautiyal, is the resident geek and manages the product development for U2opia Mobile. He is the brain behind the innovative product line including Fonetwish; USSD based interactive service which brings the power of internet to every mobile phone.
With hands on experience across large key platforms like CRBT, USSD, Billing Engines and Content Management Systems, Ankit guides and manages the high end technology Research and Development team at U2opia Mobile. His knowledge of integrating with an operatorâ€™s internal architecture as well as passion for speed and innovation is a key ingredient to the success of the company.
